text: Moors Sports Club, based in Colombo, has been active since 1908. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Major League Tournament which they have won once, in 2002â€“03. Their home ground is the Moors Sports Club Ground in Colombo. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in Sri Lanka Category:1908 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Moors Sports Club
